did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two typescript essays on pederasty: "An Evolutionary Approach to Understanding Adult Male Sexual Interest in Boys," and "'Why, Yes! How Else Should I Have Grown?': A Cross-Cultural Perspective on Pederasty."

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two typescript essays on pederasty: "An Evolutionary Approach to Understanding Adult Male Sexual Interest in Boys," and "'Why, Yes! How Else Should I Have Grown?': A Cross-Cultural Perspective on Pederasty."
